Header: THE FINAL WISHES OF THE LATE PROFESSOR CARLO FONSEKA THAT WILL COME TO PASS THIS EVENING
Content: The remains of the late Professor Carlo Fonseka will be handed over to the Ragama Medical Faculty this evening according to his last wishes. Professor Carlo Fonseka a former President of the Sri Lanka Medical Council passed away at his home this afternoon. He was 86 years old when he passed away after a brief illness this afternoon in his house.
